mapper.select: SELECT SUM(C.TOTPRICE) FROM ORDERS O, ORDER_DETAIL D, (SELECT (B.BOOK_SALEPRICE * D.ORDER_B_CNT) AS TOTPRICE, D.ORDER_NO AS O_NO FROM ORDERS O, ORDER_DETAIL D, BOOK B WHERE O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO AND D.ORDER_B_NO = B.BOOK_NO AND D.ORDER_OFFICE_NO = 'store2' AND O.ORDER_DATE = '2020/09/09') C WHERE O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO AND D.ORDER_NO = C.O_NO GROUP BY D.ORDER_OFFICE_NO, O.ORDER_DATE;

SELECT O.ORDER_NO, D.ORDER_B_NO, o.order_user_id, o.order_recv_name, o.order_recv_phone, o.order_date, B.BOOK_NAME, b.book_saleprice, d.order_b_cnt FROM ORDERS O, ORDER_BOOK D, BOOK B WHERE o.order_no = d.order_no AND d.book_no = b.book_no AND d.order_office_no = 'store2'

SELECT b.book_no, b.category_no, b.book_name, b.book_writer, b.book_publisher, b.book_price, b.book_saleprice, NVL(b.book_info, '데이터없음') AS book_info, NVL(b.book_published_date, '9999/12/31') AS book_published_date, NVL(b.book_total_page, 0) as book_total_page, NVL(b.book_entered_date, '9999/12/31') as book_entered_date, NVL(b.ebook, 0) as ebook, NVL(b.book_isbn, 0) as book_isbn, b.book_img, bs.cnt FROM BOOK B, STORE S, BOOK_STOCK BS WHERE b.book_no = bs.book_no AND s.store_code = bs.store_code AND s.store_code = 'store2'

SELECT SUM(B.BOOK_SALEPRICE * D.ORDER_B_CNT) sumSales FROM ORDERS O, ORDER_BOOK D, BOOK B WHERE O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO AND D.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO AND d.order_office_no = 'store2' AND O.ORDER_DATE = '2020/09/09' GROUP BY d.order_office_no

SELECT SUM(B.BOOK_SALEPRICE * D.ORDER_B_CNT) sumSales FROM ORDERS O, ORDER_BOOK D, BOOK B WHERE O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO AND D.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO AND d.order_office_no = 'store2' AND O.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('2020-09-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2020-09-30', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY d.order_office_no

SELECT o.order_date, sum(o.order_total_cost) AS TOTCOST FROM ORDERS O, ORDER_BOOK D, BOOK B WHERE O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO AND D.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO AND d.order_office_no = 'store2' AND O.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN add_months(SYSDATE,-1) AND SYSDATE GROUP BY O.ORDER_DATE
